verses.name: Joshua 24:15
verses.text: And if it seem evil unto you to serve the Lord, choose you this day whom ye will serve; whether the gods which your fathers served that were on the other side of the flood, or the gods of the Amorites, in whose land ye dwell: but as for me and my house, we will serve the Lord.

verses.name: Joshua 24:16
verses.text: And the people answered and said, God forbid that we should forsake the Lord, to serve other gods;
